UTF8 -> BINARY
11000010 (RET?) 10110100 (mov ah) 00001001 (9) 11000010 (RET 9) 10111010 (mov dx) 00001100 00000001 (C1 in reality 010C) 11001101 (int) 10100001 (hex: a1) 11000010 (hex: a2) (so in reality 21) 10111000 (mov ax -> mov is 1011, w is 1, ax is 000) 00100000 (? what) 01001100 (4C) 11001101 (int) 10100001 (? where is 21) 01001000 (0100 1reg â€“ DEC registras, dec ax)  01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111 00100000 01010111 01101111 01110010 01101100 01100100 00100100 01000001 01000100 01000011
BINARY -> HEX
c2 b4 9 c2 ba c 1 cd a1 c2 b8 20 4c cd a1 48 65 6c 6c 6f 20 57 6f 72 6c 64 24 41 44 43
